${ModID}:ID_5.NAME: Careless Strike
${ModID}:ID_5.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Discard 1 card. Draw 1 card.

${ModID}:ID_6.NAME: Recoup
${ModID}:ID_6.DESCRIPTION: Add 1 Shiv to your hand for every card you discarded this turn.

${ModID}:ID_10.NAME: Bare-knuckle Punch
${ModID}:ID_10.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less [E] for each card discarded this turn. Deal !D! damage.

${ModID}:ID_11.NAME: Crowd Cutter
${ModID}:ID_11.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies for each enemy in combat.

${ModID}:ID_12.NAME: Explore Options
${ModID}:ID_12.DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 Card. Draw !M! cards. Discard all cards drawn this way that do not share the discarded cards type.

${ModID}:ID_14.NAME: Stay Alert
${ModID}:ID_14.DESCRIPTION: Gain 4 !B! Block. Gain 4 !M! Block X times next turn..

${ModID}:ID_15.NAME: Hissy Fit
${ModID}:ID_15.DESCRIPTION: Discard up to 2 cards. Deal 5 !D! damage. Deal !M! for every discarded card.

${ModID}:ID_16.NAME: Pre-planned
${ModID}:ID_16.DESCRIPTION: Discard 2 cards. Draw 1 extra card next turn.

${ModID}:ID_17.NAME: Sneak up
${ModID}:ID_17.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Mark. Deal !D! for every Mark.

${ModID}:ID_18.NAME: Collateral Damage
${ModID}:ID_18.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Mark deal !D! to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:ID_22.NAME: Lash out
${ModID}:ID_22.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. When discarded deal !D! to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:ID_23.NAME: Lightningclap
${ModID}:ID_23.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and deal !D! to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:ID_24.NAME: Repurpose
${ModID}:ID_24.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a Strike or Defend. Deal !D! damage.

${ModID}:ID_25.NAME: Desperate Strike
${ModID}:ID_25.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Discard a random card next turn.

${ModID}:ID_26.NAME: Insurance
${ModID}:ID_26.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw or discard a card this turn gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:ID_27.NAME: Caffeine
${ModID}:ID_27.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you have no cards in hand during your turn, draw a card.

${ModID}:ExampleTwoAmountPowerCard.NAME: Two Amount Power
${ModID}:ExampleTwoAmountPowerCard.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Strength and !${ModID}:m2! Dexterity.

${ModID}:InlinePowerDemo.NAME: Inline Power
${ModID}:InlinePowerDemo.DESCRIPTION: Strikes deal !M! more damage. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: additional damage. At the end of your turn, gain #b

${ModID}:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.NAME: Cool Card Stuff
${ModID}:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.DESCRIPTION: Choose from 1 of 3 cost 0 cards from any class. NL Add it into your hand. NL It gains Ethereal and Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card to add into your hand with Ethereal and Exhaust.

${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.NAME: Easy X Cost
${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage X{!M!|>0=+!M!} times. NL Gain X{!M!|>0=+!M!} Strength. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:EasyModalChoiceDemo.NAME: Easy Modal Choice
${ModID}:EasyModalChoiceDemo.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: Draw !M! cards or gain !${ModID}:m2! Strength.

${ModID}:DrawAndShiv.NAME: Draw and Shiv
${ModID}:DrawAndShiv.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Add 1 *Shiv into your hand.

${ModID}:TwoTypesOfDamage.NAME: Two Damage Values
${ModID}:TwoTypesOfDamage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you're Vulnerable, deal !${ModID}:sd! damage instead.

${ModID}:StartupBlockCard.NAME: Startup And AOE
${ModID}:StartupBlockCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Startup: Gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:MultiCardPreviewAndDrawCallback.NAME: Previews and Callbacks
${ModID}:MultiCardPreviewAndDrawCallback.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Shuffle *Smite{!Upgrades!|>0=+} and *Safety{!Upgrades!|>0=+} into your draw pile. NL Draw 1 card. NL If it's Colorless, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
